title: Deployment
description: Alvares ths enriches deployment data from Aspen with some added properties.

cluster.description: The name of the cluster (stage, active..)

version.description: The version of the image deployed

imageName.description: The name of the image deployed

applicationPath.description: The path that is published by the deployment. Either and absolute URL och a relaltive path beginning with /. Empty if no http endpoint.

slackChannels.description: A comma separated list of channels to send report to

friendlyName.description: The best public name to use based on application name or public names.

publicNameSwedish.description: The swedish name of the application

publicNameEnglish.description: The english name of the application

descriptionSwedish.description: The swedish description of the application

descriptionEnglish.description: The english description of the application

monitorUrl.descriptions: The url to the _monitor page of the application. Either an absolute URL or a relative path beginning with /

applicationUrl.descriptions: The url to the index page of the application. Either an absolute URL.

monitorPattern.descriptions: A string that should exist on the monitor page of the application.

created.description: The date time of when the application was deployed

detectifyProfileTokens.description: The tokens used for detectify integrations

testAccessibility.description: Should set if accessability testing should be performed by alvares

accessibilityUrls.description: Overrides the root application url for accessibility scanning

team.descriptions: A team name. Ex team-studadm or team-e-larande.
